Happy Rails Day!

Posted by chad

RailsDay 2006 is in progress! Teams around the world will be working furiously all day to produce the best application possible in 24 hours.

This year, you can watch the action as it happens with live(ish) commit stats and a Rails Day campfire. Not quite a spectator sport yet, but entertaining none-the-less.
